entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
